solution_line_template: Spending ${total_ingredient_cost} on ingredients for {num_cakes_for_ingredients} cakes, he spends {total_ingredient_cost} / {num_cakes_for_ingredients} = $<<{total_ingredient_cost}/{num_cakes_for_ingredients}={ingredient_cost_per_cake}>>{ingredient_cost_per_cake} on ingredients per cake.

Adding the cost of packaging, he spends {ingredient_cost_per_cake} + {packaging_cost_per_cake} = $<<{ingredient_cost_per_cake}+{packaging_cost_per_cake}={total_cost_per_cake}>>{total_cost_per_cake} per cake.

Selling each cake for ${selling_price_per_cake}, Andy's profit is {selling_price_per_cake} - {total_cost_per_cake} = $<<{selling_price_per_cake}-{total_cost_per_cake}={profit_per_cake}>>{profit_per_cake} per cake.
